## Setup

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
# Load libraries & data -------------------------------------
library(dplyr)
library(cards)
library(gtsummary)

adae <- random.cdisc.data::cadae
adsl <- random.cdisc.data::cadsl

adsl <- adsl |>
  filter(SAFFL == "Y")

data <- adae |>
  filter(
    SAFFL == "Y",
    TRTEMFL == "Y"
  ) |>
  mutate(
    SEXGR = "Sex, n (%)",
    SEXGR1 = as.factor(SEX),
    AGEGR = "Age group, years, n(%)",
    AGEGR1 = factor(
      dplyr::case_when(
        AGE >= 17 & AGE < 65 ~ ">=17 to <65",
        AGE >= 65 & AGE < 75 ~ "65-74",
        AGE >= 75 ~ ">=75"
      ),
      levels = c(">=17 to <65", "65-74", ">=75")
    ),
    RACEGR = "Race, n(%)",
    RACEGR1 = as.factor(RACE),
    ETHNICGR = "Ethnicity, n(%)",
    ETHNICGR1 = as.factor(RACE)
  )

data_any_ae <- adae |>
  filter(AESEV != "") |>
  mutate(AESEV = "Any AE, n(%)")
```

## Build Table

```{r tbl, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tbl_any_ae <- tbl_hierarchical(
  data = data_any_ae,
  denominator = adsl,
  id = "USUBJID",
  by = "ARM",
  variables = "AESEV",
  statistic = ~"{n} ({p}%)",
  label = AESEV ~ "Characteristic"
)

tbl_sex <- tbl_hierarchical(
  data = data,
  denominator = data_any_ae |> slice_head(by = c(USUBJID)),
  id = "USUBJID",
  by = "ARM",
  variables = c(SEXGR, SEXGR1),
  include = SEXGR1,
  statistic = ~"{n}/{N} ({p}%)"
)

tbl_agegr1 <- tbl_hierarchical(
  data = data,
  denominator = data_any_ae |> slice_head(by = c(USUBJID)),
  id = "USUBJID",
  by = "ARM",
  variables = c(AGEGR, AGEGR1),
  include = AGEGR1,
  statistic = ~"{n}/{N} ({p}%)"
)

tbl_race <- tbl_hierarchical(
  data = data,
  denominator = data_any_ae |> slice_head(by = c(USUBJID)),
  id = "USUBJID",
  by = "ARM",
  variables = c(RACEGR, RACEGR1),
  include = RACEGR1,
  statistic = ~"{n}/{N} ({p}%)"
)

tbl_ethnic <- tbl_hierarchical(
  data = data,
  denominator = data_any_ae |> slice_head(by = c(USUBJID)),
  id = "USUBJID",
  by = "ARM",
  variables = c(ETHNICGR, ETHNICGR1),
  include = ETHNICGR1,
  statistic = ~"{n}/{N} ({p}%)"
)

tbl <- list(tbl_any_ae, tbl_sex, tbl_agegr1, tbl_race, tbl_ethnic) |>
  tbl_stack() |>
  modify_column_indent("label", rows = !(variable %in% c("..ard_hierarchical_overall..", "AESEV", "SEXGR", "AGEGR", "RACEGR", "ETHNICGR"))) |>
  remove_footnote_header(columns = everything())

tbl
```

## Build ARD

```{r ard, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide'}
ard <- gather_ard(tbl)

ard
```

